location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.322 of 1852 from Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of Malet's earlier note, and a copy of a report from Major Hamerton, Her Majesty's Consul at Muscat. Kemball writes that the documents from Malet and Hamerton confirm his anticipated withdrawal by the Imam of Muscat from the dispute between the two branches of the Bahraini ruling family.
